entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oak Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oak Point Marine 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Clearing after midnight. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
